single_crochet - single_crochet  double_crochet - double_crochet  decrease - double_crochet 2 together  dc3tog double_crochet 3 together  dc4tog double_crochet 4 together  working into a chain-1 space  sewing a seam  making a tassel please visit http //www sweaterbabe com/cabbr htm shown in size 6-12 months for a list of standard crochet abbreviations finished measurements side view of hat front view of hat xs s m l = approximately 6 ¾ 7 ½ 8 ¼ 9 ¼ from bottom of hat to top measured along front band not including strap materials  2 2 2 2 -1 75oz/50g 98 5yds/90m balls of debbie bliss cashmerino aran 55% merino wool/33% microfiber/12% cashmere in orange #615 please note size xs uses exactly 1 ball not including yarn to make the gauge swatch so it is possible to only use 1 ball for the xs size if you reuse the gauge swatch yarn and are careful not to waste any yarn purchasing 2 balls is still recommended to be safe  size i/9 5 5mm crochet hook or size to obtain gauge  one ¾ and much more  tapestry or sewing needle to attach button depends on what needle will fit through the button you choose gauge  4 sts = 1 i e 4 1 single_crochet 2 double_crochet sets = 3 and approximately 9 row = 4 in silt pattern stitch please take time to check your gauge silt pattern stitch chain a multiple of 3 plus 3 extra row 1 rs skip 1st 3 chain 1 double_crochet in next and each chain to end turn row 2 chain 1 2 double_crochet in 1st st *skip next 2 sts 1 single_crochet 2 double_crochet in next st repeat from * to last 3 sts counting t-chain as a st skip next 2 sts 1 single_crochet in
